name: Paranoid
desc:
Finished with my <input type="text" value="" data-result="woman" /> 'cause she
couldn't help me with my <input type="text" value="" data-result="mind" />.
People think I'm <input type="text" value="" data-result="insane" /> because
I am frowning all the <input type="text" value="" data-result="time" />.

All day long I <input type="text" value="" data-result="think" /> of things
but nothing seems to <input type="text" value="" data-result="satisfy" />.
Think I'll lose my <input type="text" value="" data-result="mind" /> if I don't
find <input type="text" value="" data-result="something" /> to pacify

Can you <input type="text" value="" data-result="help" /> me?
Occupy my <input type="text" value="" data-result="brain" />
Oh yeah

Make a <input type="text" value="" data-result="joke" /> and I will sigh
and you will <input type="text" value="" data-result="laugh" />
and I will <input type="text" value="" data-result="cry" />.
Happiness I cannot <input type="text" value="" data-result="feel" />
and love to me is so <input type="text" value="" data-result="unreal" />.

And so as you hear these <input type="text" value="" data-result="words" />
telling you now of my <input type="text" value="" data-result="state" />.
I tell you to <input type="text" value="" data-result="enjoy" /> life
I wish I could but it's <input type="text" value="" data-result="too" /> late.
